bio.summary: I'm a web developer and former systems science student with a passion for developing elegant software, both for the desktop and for the web. I thrive in environments where I get the opportunity to work with people who are as passionate about what they do as I am; hence my infatuation with open-source software.

work.summary: Lead the front-end development of Blocket's realestate division during a huge growth period
highlights: Developed the interactive realestate map as my first project
Played a large role in the implementation of the new design of Blocket Bostad
Lead the effort of creating a UI toolkit for internal use

work.summary: Worked as a PHP developer maintaining both legacy projects and developing new ones
highlights: Was part of creating a bespoke PHP CMS for a complex community site

courses: Enterprise Architecture and Service Oriented Architecture
